$ awk '{ips[$1]++;} END{for (ip in ips) {print ips[ip],ip | "sort -nrk 1 | head"}}' www_access_20140823.log
6958 123.174.51.164
2307 111.85.34.165
1617 118.112.143.148
1489 117.63.146.40
1404 118.182.116.39
1352 1.48.219.30
1132 60.222.231.46
1129 10.35.1.82
943 27.227.163.200
880 58.253.6.133

$ awk '{ips[$1]+=1;} END{for (ip in ips) {print ips[ip]" "ip;}}' www_access_20140823.log | sort -nr
6958 123.174.51.164
2307 111.85.34.165
1617 118.112.143.148
1489 117.63.146.40
1404 118.182.116.39
1352 1.48.219.30
1132 60.222.231.46
1129 10.35.1.82
943 27.227.163.200
880 58.253.6.133

$ awk '{print $1}' www_access_20140823.log | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr | head
   6958 123.174.51.164
   2307 111.85.34.165
   1617 118.112.143.148
   1489 117.63.146.40
   1404 118.182.116.39
   1352 1.48.219.30
   1132 60.222.231.46
   1129 10.35.1.82
    943 27.227.163.200
    880 58.253.6.133
